template.title: Software Application Development Project
template.description: Full-stack web application development including requirements analysis, design, development, testing, and deployment.

tasks.name: Requirements Gathering & Analysis
tasks.notes: Meet with stakeholders, document requirements, create user stories

tasks.name: System Design & Architecture
tasks.notes: Design database schema, API architecture, system components

tasks.name: UI/UX Design & Wireframes
tasks.notes: Create wireframes, mockups, user interface designs

tasks.name: Development Environment Setup
tasks.notes: Configure servers, databases, development tools, CI/CD pipeline

tasks.name: Backend API Development
tasks.notes: Develop REST APIs, business logic, database integration

tasks.name: Frontend Development
tasks.notes: Build user interface, implement responsive design, integrate APIs

tasks.name: Database Implementation
tasks.notes: Create database tables, indexes, stored procedures, data migration

tasks.name: Unit Testing
tasks.notes: Write and execute unit tests for all components

tasks.name: Integration Testing
tasks.notes: Test API integrations, end-to-end workflows, cross-browser testing

tasks.name: Security Implementation
tasks.notes: Implement authentication, authorization, data encryption, security auditing

tasks.name: Performance Optimization
tasks.notes: Code optimization, database tuning, caching implementation

tasks.name: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.notes: End-user testing, feedback collection, bug fixes

tasks.name: Documentation & Training
tasks.notes: Create user manuals, technical documentation, conduct training sessions

tasks.name: Deployment & Go-Live
tasks.notes: Production deployment, monitoring setup, post-launch support
